title: Stormy Daniels attends Trump lawyer's hearing
text:
Stormy Daniels attends Trump lawyer's hearing 1:37am IST - 01:48 
As adult-film actress Stormy Daniels looked on, a federal judge ordered U.S. President Donald Trump’s longtime personal lawyer Michael Cohen to cough up the name of client he had hoped to keep secret at a Monday court hearing: Sean Hannity. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
